name: AVCaptureInput.Port
desc: A specific stream of data provided by a capture input.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the port is enabled.

items.name: var input: AVCaptureInput
items.desc: The input object that owns the port.

items.name: var formatDescription: CMFormatDescription?
items.desc: A description of the port format.

items.name: var clock: CMClock?
items.desc: An object representing the capture device’s own clock.

items.name: var sourceDeviceType: AVCaptureDevice.DeviceType?
items.desc: The device type of the source camera providing the photo.

items.name: var sourceDevicePosition: AVCaptureDevice.Position
items.desc: The position of the source device providing input through this port.

items.name: static let AVCaptureInputPortFormatDescriptionDidChange: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification the system posts when the capture input port’s format description changes.
